CVE.summary: Unspecified vulnerability in Oracle Java SE 6u81, 7u67, and 8u20 allows remote attackers to affect confidentiality, integrity, and availability via unknown vectors related to Deployment, a different vulnerability than CVE-2014-4288, CVE-2014-6493, and CVE-2014-6532.

vFeed.Product: vFeed - The Correlated Vulnerability and Threat Database
vFeed.Author: NJ OUCHN

JRE and JDK Vulnerability on HPUX

SUSE-SU-2014:1526-1 -- Security update for IBM Java (important)
